long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Solitaire is a classic card game that is both fun and educational. Klondike Solitaire keeps your mind sharp, and your day fun! Solitaire is played with 52 cards. Stack cards in descending order, alternating color. Start at the King, and build down to the Ace. The goal of the game is to get all cards into the foundations in the top-right corner. Beat Solitaire when all cards are in the foundations
Fullscreen mode - http://www.klondikerise.com
